name: babbage-web
description: Web front-end of the ONS website
author: Bren

config.js: js/third-party/moment.js js/third-party/highcharts.js js/third-party/highcharts-more.js js/third-party/pym.min.js js/third-party/js.cookie.min.js js/app/external-link.js js/app/analytics.js js/app/accessibility-enhance.js js/app/markdown-chart.js js/app/linechart.js js/app/table.js js/app/sparkline.js js/app/auto-submit-form.js js/app/load-results.js js/app/pagination.js js/app/rss-feed-url-generator.js js/app/time-series-tool.js js/app/pym-interactive.js js/app/mobile-table.js js/app/mobile-chart.js js/app/print-compendium.js

scripts.postinstall: cd ./node_modules && git clone -b $npm_config_sixteens_branch --single-branch --depth=1 https://github.com/ONSdigital/sixteens && cd sixteens && npm install --production && cd ../../ && npm run build-babbage-js
